ProductInfo.Features:
See and record* your live video feed from anywhere in the world at any time using an internet connected computer
See your live feed from your smartphone** (access directly from your smart phone web browser or use third party apps)
Supports multiple True IP cameras - up to 9 cameras
No third-party software required
Secure - WiFi compliant and supports WEP, WPA, and WPA2 encryption
